contentrichtext.text: [[Image:GAMap-doton-Manor.PNG|right|Location of Manor, Georgia]] '''Manor''' (pronounced with a long "a") is an [[Unincorporated area|unincorporated community]] in [[Ware County, Georgia|Ware County]], [[Georgia (U.S. state)|Georgia]], [[United States]]. It lies southwest of [[Waycross, Georgia|Waycross]] on [[U.S. Route 84]]. The community is part of the Waycross [[Waycross micropolitan area|Micropolitan Statistical Area]]. Former home of Ware Magnet, a [[Georgia School of Success]]. After a majority vote by school board members, the K-12 school was closed in May 2010 due to financial issues despite its indisputable academic excellence.<ref>http://jacksonville.com/news/georgia/2009-11-10/story/ware_county_school_board_votes_to_close_ware_magnet_school</ref> == Geography == Manor is located near {{coord|31|12|50|N|82|21|18|W|}}{{GR|1}}. {{Ware County, Georgia}} ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Unincorporated communities in Georgia (U.S. state)]] [[Category:Populated places in Ware County, Georgia]] [[Category:Waycross, Georgia micropolitan area]] {{GeorgiaUS-geo-stub}}
